original_title: Person shot and killed in Hungama
original_body_lines: A shooting incident has been reported this afternoon (02) in the Pingama area of Hungama, Ambalanthota.
Police said that the shooting has occurred over a dispute pertaining to a paddy field.
The shooting was reportedly carried out with a licensed firearm and the victim was killed on the spot.
The person who carried out the shooting has subsequently surrendered to the Hungama Police Station along with the firearm.
Hungama Police are conducting further investigations on the instructions of the SSP in charge of the Tangalle Division.
